name: oddly
content:

C2 in a strange or surprising way: Didn't you think she was behaving very oddly at the party yesterday? Oddly enough (= this is strange/surprising), she didn't mention anything about the fact that she was getting married.
More examplesFewer examplesShe's gone away for six months, but oddly enough , her boyfriend doesn't seem too unhappy about it.She was dressed very oddly for a country walk.He behaved rather oddly at the funeral.They were an oddly assorted bunch of people.
